exporter.name: Google App Engine
exporter.description: Run your web applications on Google's infrastructure. Build apps on the same scalable systems that power Google applications.

exporter.name: Static Site Exporter
exporter.description: Exports your entire site to a ZIP file which you can view from anywhere.

exporter.name: GoGoEgo Exporter
exporter.description: Export this GoGoEgo site to another GoGoEgo site. The receiving site must have the Importer Application installed.
